sentences.sContent: his visceral hatred of the ruling class
sentences.sCn: 他对统治阶级发自肺腑的仇恨

synos.tran: [解剖]内脏的；出于本能的；发自肺腑的；粗俗的

phrases.pCn: 内脏；脏器（visceral organ的复数形式）

trans.tranCn: 内心深处的； 内脏的
trans.tranOther: visceral beliefs and attitudes are the result of strong feelings rather than careful thought
